# AGI Workforce

> Autonomous desktop automation platform powered by AI

## Key Features
- Visual workflow builder for desktop automation
- Multi-LLM support (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Ollama)
- Browser automation with Playwright
- Desktop UI automation
- Free local LLMs via Ollama
- Built with Tauri + Rust for performance
- MIT licensed and open source

## Product Info
- Platform: Desktop (Windows 10/11, macOS planned Q2 2026)
- Current Version: v0.1.0-alpha (Early Access)
- Pricing: Currently 100% free (alpha), paid tiers planned Q2 2026
- License: MIT License
- Download: https://agiworkforce.com/download
- GitHub: https://github.com/siddharthanagula3/agiworkforce-desktop

## Pricing Plans (Future - Q2 2026)
- Free Forever: Unlimited local automation with Ollama
- Pay-Per-Result: $0.50 per successful automation
- Pro Unlimited: $39/month for unlimited automations
- Enterprise: Custom pricing for organizations

## Documentation
- Features: https://agiworkforce.com/features
- Pricing: https://agiworkforce.com/pricing
- Changelog: https://agiworkforce.com/changelog
- API Docs: https://agiworkforce.com/api/docs (coming soon)

## Technology Stack
- Frontend: Tauri + React + TypeScript
- Backend: Rust
- Automation: Playwright, UI Automation
- LLMs: OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Ollama
- Database: SQLite (local)

## Use Cases
- Data entry automation
- Web scraping and data extraction
- Report generation
- Email automation
- CRM data management
- Spreadsheet processing
- Document processing
- Browser testing

## Status
Solo founder project in active development. Alpha software - expect bugs and breaking changes. No support team. Community support via GitHub Issues only.

## Contact
- Website: https://agiworkforce.com
- GitHub Issues: https://github.com/siddharthanagula3/agiworkforce-desktop/issues
- Email: contact@agiworkforce.com
